Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")]

summary.span: 为用于呈现 ASP.NET 移动控件的所有 对象提供基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for all objects used for rendering ASP.NET mobile controls.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类及其继承的类提供用于执行呈现的适配器的服务和帮助器方法。The class and its inherited classes provide services and helper methods for adapters to perform rendering.

related.span: 自适应控制行为的体系结构概述

span.span: Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior

related.span: 适配器集功能

span.span: Adapter Sets Functionality

related.span: 移动文本编写器呈现最佳做法

span.span: Mobile Text Writer Rendering Best Practices

remarks.format: ## Remarks 适配器通常由 ASP.NET 自动构造，并且必须具有无参数的构造函数。Adapters are usually constructed automatically by ASP.NET and must have a parameterless constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 页面适配器必须在呈现页面之前调用此方法，但在调用方法之后 。The page adapter must call this method before rendering the page, but after calling the method. 如果多次调用方法，将引发异常 。An exception is raised if the method is called more than once.

span.span: this method is called more than once.

span.span: The URL string.

summary.span: 写入给定 URL，并针对目标设备正确对其进行编码。

span.span: Writes the given URL, encoding it correctly for the target device.

summary.span: URL 可以包括参数。

span.span: The URL might include parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根据 URL 编码规范转换 URL。The URL is translated in accordance with the specification for URL encoding. 例如，URL 的主部分中的空格转换为 %20，URL 的参数部分中的空格转换为加号 (+) 符号，"/" 字符转换为% 2f，依此类推。For example, spaces in the main part of the URL are translated into %20, spaces in the parameter part of the URL are translated into plus (+) signs, the '/' character is translated into %2f, and so forth. 派生的编写器类可以重写此方法。Derived writer classes can override this method.

related.span: 自适应控制行为的体系结构概述

span.span: Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior

related.span: 适配器集功能

span.span: Adapter Sets Functionality

public: virtual void WriteEncodedUrlParameter(System::String ^ urlText);

span.span: The URL string.

param.span: 如果参数为 ，则将该字符串视为 URL 参数的一部分进行编码。
